code: import React from'react';import Post from'./Post/Post';import s from'./MyPosts.module.css';import{reduxForm,Field}from"redux-form";import{maxLengthCreator,required}from'../../../utils/validators/validators';import{Textarea}from'../../common/FormsControls/FormsControls';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var maxLength10=maxLengthCreator(10);var AddNewPostForm=function AddNewPostForm(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:props.handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Field,{component:Textarea,name:'NewPostText',validate:[required,maxLength10],placeholder:'Post message'})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Add post"})})]});};var AddNewPostFormRedux=reduxForm({form:'NewPostText'})(AddNewPostForm);var MyPosts=function MyPosts(props){var postsElements=props.posts.map(function(p){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Post,{message:p.message,likesCount:p.likesCount},p.id);});var onAddPost=function onAddPost(values){props.addPost(values.NewPostText);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:s.postsBlock,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"My post"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddNewPostFormRedux,{onSubmit:onAddPost})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:s.posts,children:postsElements})]});};export default MyPosts;
